title: ISic020774. ISic020774
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΠΥΚ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani, in Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018.

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This document with a sequence of three letters was found in grave 211, together with two other vessels with inscriptions, MMA 68 (ISic020756) and MMA 69 (ISic020775).

bibliography

  • Agostiniani Forthcoming MMA 67 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002519
  • Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018 184-185, fig. 95 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001345
